page.title: 18Sainsbury's Superstore
page.content: Sainsbury's is on Woodhall Farm estate next to Valley Green. It is quite a big shop and alot of people shop there. In our survey we found that about{30% came from outside Hemel {Hempstead}and some travel from a long way away to shop here while visiting relatives. They have an enormous car park of about 390 spaces. There are about{300 employees}but about half are part-time. The most popular shopping day is Friday. The store is 1900 sq.m. in area. They sell about{4000 products Including groceries, fresh foods, household goods and even electrical accessories. Deliveries are either direct from the manufacturer or in their own lorries from their own supply depots. There are three other shops next to Sainsbury's:- Martins {(newsagent),}a{Chemist/Hardware}shop, and Threshers{(Off-licence).
